page.title: 09KINGSKERSWELL/RECREATION
page.content: {RECREATION AND ENTERTAINMENT Television was the most popular activity.Here is a list of electronic entertainments in order of popularity. Television = 93% Video = 35% Radio = 88% Computer = 27% Sterio = 62% Video games = 21% Other popular activities are: Bird watching = 72% Drawing = 55% Walking = 72% Sightseeing = 29% Writing = 58% Clubs include: The over 60's and Dancing Clubs,Scouts,Cubs,Guides and Brownies. Popular Sports include: Swimming =82% Bowling =26% Rugby =19% Football =47% Fishing =26% Golf =13% Cricket =37% Sailing =19% Darts =29% Cycling =28% Netball =14% Tennis=35% Billiards=14% Athletics=27% Badminton=23% Snooker =29%
